deals.pitchHtml:
Any price comparison is to a new, nonrefurbished product.

HP Pavilion 15.6" TouchSmart Notebook PC (15-N013DX)

HP's TouchSmart Notebook PC eliminates the dilemma of choosing between a laptop's convenience and a tablet's ease of navigation—it simply includes both benefits. A full island-style keyboard makes drafting emails a breeze, and the 15.6" display not only wolf-whistles at its own HD images, it also doubles as a touchscreen. Everything gets stored in a 500GB hard drive big enough for office documents and photos and videos of friends.

  • Product number: 15-N013DX
  • 15.6" HD BrightView LED touchscreen display
  • 1.7GHz processor can reach up to 2.7GHz
  • 500GB hard drive
  • 4MB cache
  • 4GB DDR3L SDRAM
  • Windows 8 operating system
  • Two USB 3.0 ports double as jellybean storage
  • Condition: manufacturer refurbished
  • 90-day warranty from HP
  • Technical specifications

To complete your Goods order, simply purchase this Groupon and provide your name and shipping address.

Please check the Fine Print for this deal’s estimated delivery timeframe. We work with thousands of brands to deliver the amazing selection you see on Groupon Goods, and this shipping window ensures we have enough time to coordinate with our suppliers to get you the products you love.

deals.pitchHtml:
Comedy has long been used to subvert the established order, shedding light on modern life's pervasive absurdities and fomenting distrust of potentially seltzer-filled boutonnieres. Discover some rollicking truths with this GrouponLive deal.

The Deal

  • Standup-comedy show
  • When: Wednesdays–Sundays at 8 p.m.
  • Where: Dark Horse Comedy Club
  • Seating: general admission
  • Door time: 7:30 p.m.
  • Ticket values include all fees.

Ticket Options

  • $4 for two tickets to a comedy show (up to a $50 value)
  • $5 for three tickets to a comedy show (up to a $75 value)
  • $6 for four tickets to a comedy show (up to a $100 value)
  • $19 for two tickets to a show (up to a $25 value each) and two drinks (up to a $12 value each), plus two tickets to a future show (a $25 value each; up to a $124 total value)

For the last option, every person is required to purchase at least one additional drink at their initial show, and at least two additional drinks at their future show. For all other options, every person is required to purchase at least two drinks.

Frequent Performers

Keith Alberstadt
As seen on Comedy Central and Late Show with David Letterman

Warning: contains mild language, evidence of being a terrible gift giver

Sheng Wang
As seen on Comedy Central Presents Sheng Wang

Sara Schaefer
Star of MTV’s Nikki & Sara LIVE

Warning: contains some wirty dords and butterflies doing gross things

Dark Horse Comedy Club

Founded by the group of comics who also created Tribeca Comedy Lounge, Dark Horse Comedy Club features both the superstars who can be found at the Lounge and the up-and-comers most likely to end up with their faces on t-shirts. Featured comics include Keith Alberstadt, who's appeared on Late Show with David Letterman several times, Sheng Wang, star of his own Comedy Central Presents special, and Sara Schaefer, star of MTV's The Nikki and Sara Show. Guests may complement giggles with selections from an extensive wine list or entrees from a roster of hearty pub food, which lets audiences pair their jokes with burgers, pasta dishes, and chickens who will never, ever cross another road.

deals.pitchHtml:
A nice photo can capture the essence of a family or just serve as a reminder of what they all looked like before they had to sell their faces to the mask store. Save face with this Groupon.

Choose from Three Options

  • $9.99 for a 10"x7" custom metal print ($69.99 value)
  • $14.99 for a 14"x11" custom metal print ($89.95 value)
  • $19.99 for a 20"x16" custom metal print ($139.95 value)

Shiny aluminum sheets give photos of family and friends a modern, elegant look in these eye-catching photo prints. The images stay put on metal for years and will resist peeling, fading, and water damage no matter how many water slides you throw them down. Easily access photos from virtually anywhere—including Facebook and Instagram—with the online design tool.

deals.pitchHtml:
Sake comes from fermenting rice, just as seltzer comes from carbonating water and syrup comes from making trees cry. Revel in the power of rice with this Groupon.

$29 for a Japanese Meal for Two (Up to $66 Value)

  • One appetizer (up to a $5 value)
  • Two regular sushi rolls (up to a $6.50 value each)
  • Two specialty sushi rolls (up to a $14 value each)
  • Two beers, glasses of wine, or cocktails (up to a $10 value each)

The menu includes appetizers such as gyoza and vegetarian spring rolls, regular sushi rolls such as the philadelphia roll and the spicy scallop and avocado roll, and specialty rolls such as the titanic roll—filled with salmon, crab, and avocado and topped with kiwi, scallop, and tobiko.

deals.pitchHtml:
Some things you have to see in person to fully appreciate, such as a stage musical or the newer, deeper Grand Canyon. Take it all in with this GrouponLive deal.

The Deal

  • $55 for one ticket to see Heathers: The Musical (up to $84.50 value)
  • When: select dates, May 21–July 5
  • Where: New World Stages
  • Seating: orchestra or mezzanine section
  • Door time: 30 minutes before showtime
  • Ticket values include all fees.
  • Click here to view the seating chart.
    • Need discounted parking? There's a Groupon for that.

Heathers: The Musical

"Dear Diary: My teen angst bulls**t now has a body count." And that's Heathers in a nutshell. New girl Veronica Sawyer joins the titular high-school clique, but soon discovers bumping off the Heathers is more fun than playing croquet with them and mocking Martha "Dumptruck" Dunnstock. Driving her down this path is bad boy J.D. Dean, whose too-cool attitude just might be masking a psychopathic streak. With a dark sense humor that inspires equal parts laughs and gasps, the endlessly quotable movie this musical follows brightened up homicide with a healthy dose of teenage sarcasm, shaping the slang of a generation along the way. In a word, Heathers was very.

Sharing writing duties on the gruesomely funny stage adaptation are Kevin Murphy and Laurence O'Keefe, whose previous credits include the Emmy-winning movie adaptation of Reefer Madness and the Tony-nominated Broadway musical Legally Blonde. Joining them is director Andy Fickman, who took Reefer Madness to the stage and screen. Together, their efforts have paid off. The New York Times called Heathers: The Musical "a rowdy guilty-pleasure musical . . . that turns an Ohio senior class in-crowd into a lineup of piñatas, waiting to be busted open."

deals.pitchHtml:
Facials leave skin refreshed and hydrated without frequent trips to the town dunk tank. Wake up your complexion with this Groupon.

Choose from Three Options

  • $26.50 for a 90-minute Essential Glow facial treatment (a $48 value)
  • $37.50 for a 90-minute Gold Crystal collagen facial treatment (a $68 value)
  • $76 for three 90-minute Essential Glow facial treatments (a $144 value)

The Essential Glow facial treatment begins with a deep cleansing, steaming, and peel. Following a face, neck, and shoulder massage, the aesthetician shapes the client’s brows and extracts blackheads, and then uses an ultrasound treatment to penetrate and cleanse deeper layers of the skin. Finally, smooth skin emerges after a softening and hydrating mask. The Gold Crystal collagen facial follows a similar formula, adding a collagen mask infused with vitamin E to moisturize skin and a hydrating bio-cream to smooth out skin texture.

says.emailContent: Can you fight crime in your neighborhood by volunteering to never sleep again? Find out with today's Groupon Guide.
says.emailContentHtml: Can you fight crime in your neighborhood by volunteering to never sleep again? Find out with today's Groupon Guide.
says.websiteContent:
While the police largely discourage comic book-inspired vigilantism, there are still a number of less flamboyant ways to combat crime in your community: * If you see something, say something—for instance, if you see a weird bug, make sure to tell everyone you meet that day about it.
* Install intense floodlights in your bedroom so that no burglars can hide in the shadows and watch you sleep.
* Teach children to trust the police by visiting schools dressed as something children already trust: a giant, talking dog wearing a policeman’s hat, with huge, unblinking plastic eyes.
* Join a neighborhood watch, wherein adjacent neighborhoods volunteer to take turns staying up all night and watching each other to make sure no crimes happen.
* When all else fails, join up with the lawless bands of lunatics who run your streets—you might be surprised how quickly you discard all morality in exchange for a skewer of boar meat roasted over a flaming garbage can.
says.websiteContentHtml:
While the police largely discourage comic book-inspired vigilantism, there are still a number of less flamboyant ways to combat crime in your community:

  • If you see something, say something—for instance, if you see a weird bug, make sure to tell everyone you meet that day about it.

  • Install intense floodlights in your bedroom so that no burglars can hide in the shadows and watch you sleep.

  • Teach children to trust the police by visiting schools dressed as something children already trust: a giant, talking dog wearing a policeman’s hat, with huge, unblinking plastic eyes.

  • Join a neighborhood watch, wherein adjacent neighborhoods volunteer to take turns staying up all night and watching each other to make sure no crimes happen.

  • When all else fails, join up with the lawless bands of lunatics who run your streets—you might be surprised how quickly you discard all morality in exchange for a skewer of boar meat roasted over a flaming garbage can.
says.title: The Groupon Guide to: Fighting Crime

Samsung Galaxy S4 4G LTE 16GB Android Smartphone (GSM Unlocked)

The Galaxy S4 renders images with the same color and clarity as an HDTV. Its 5" Super AMOLED display crams in an impressive 441 pixels per inch, achieving the lifelike detailing of 1080p full HD for engaging Web pages and video. A 13MP camera with autofocus and 4x digital optical zoom makes it easy to snag share-worthy shots. Touch-free controls, such as Air Gesture, similarly simplify using the Galaxy S4, letting you do things such as pause a video, scroll through a page, or veto a bill by hovering your finger over the screen. A 1.9GHz quad-core processor and Android KitKat OS fluidly move you from app to app, and a 2,600mAh battery provides generous power reserves to keep things running smoothly.

deals.pitchHtml:
Like learning to juggle, learning to cook requires patience, a distraction-free environment, and the ability to handle multiple eggplants at once. Create a future kitchen ringmaster with this Groupon.

$19.95 for a ﻿Kids’ Cooking Class at Young Chefs Academy ($45 Value)

The epicureans at Young Chefs Academy mold gastronomic artists with fun cooking classes for kids aged 4–18. Students learn the essentials of proper food handling, as well as preparation and kitchen-safety tips. Classes have a new theme each month and new recipes each week, where kids accumulate knowledge while using professional equipment in a decked-out kitchen.﻿

deals.pitchHtml:
Set Contents

  • 1qt. saucepan with lid
  • 2qt. saucepan with lid
  • 6qt. stock pot with lid
  • 3qt. sauté pan with lid
  • 8.5" skillet
  • 10" skillet
  • Two 10"x15" cookie pans

Rachael Ray Porcelain Nonstick Cookware Set

Even under the pressure of simmering sauces and sautéing stir-fries, cooks can relax just a little bit, confident in this cookware's porcelain enamel construction. The tough exterior coating distributes heat evenly to eliminate hot spots in cooking, and the interior is covered in a nonstick coating that's hard at work repelling stray bits of food. The set also includes two cookie pans, whose silicone handles are easier for bakers to grasp than the principles of cold fusion.

  • 12-piece cookware set
  • Porcelain enamel construction
  • Heats food evenly
  • Nonstick interiors
  • Two-tone gradient coloring
  • From cooking maven Rachael Ray

deals.pitchHtml:
MOTA SmartWatch with Bluetooth

MOTA's SmartWatch syncs with most smartphones, including Apple iPhones and Samsung Galaxy handhelds, via Bluetooth and a stable 2.4 GHz wireless frequency range. The watch gently vibrates when you get a call. Glance at the caller ID, then pick up the call with one-touch answering. A built-in microphone and speaker let you take the call hands-free or enjoy music streamed through the Smart watch. Antilost functionality helps you keep track of your smartphone, alerting you whenever you walk or cartwheel more than 5 feet away from it.

  • Model number and sizes:
    • Black (MT-SW1B)
    • White (MT-SW1W)
    • Small wrist size: 7"
    • Large wrist size: 7.5"
  • Syncs with most Bluetooth-enabled phones
  • Vibrates when you receive a call
  • Built-in microphone and speaker
  • One-touch answering
  • No-touch declining
  • Streams music
  • Antilost function
  • Caller ID, time, and battery indicator
  • 2.4GHz wireless frequency range
  • Bluetooth v2.0, compatible with v.1.1, 1.2, and 2.0
  • Charging time: 2–3 hours
  • One-year warranty from MOTA
  • Dimensions: 3"x2.5"x1"
  • Weight: 0.075 lb.

In the box: MOTA SmartWatch, USB wall adapter, USB charging cable, user manual, warranty information

deals.pitchHtml:
Sun salutations keep our solar body from growing angry and burning libelous graffiti on the Hubble telescope. Maintain the cosmic balance with this Groupon.

Choose from Three Options

  • $35 for 5 yoga and Pilates classes (a $100 value)
  • $45 for 10 yoga and Pilates classes (a $160 value)
  • $69 for 20 yoga and Pilates classes (a $280 value)

Zen & Yoga's yoga courses aim to calm the mind and body while increasing flexibility and creating a connection between the body and breath work. During hot-yoga classes, students move through Vinyasa-flow poses in a studio heated to 95–105 degrees. The heat opens pores and fosters detoxifying sweat. Alternatively, Pilates classes use precise movements to create proper alignment, condition entire bodies, and strengthen cores.

Though this merchant sometimes offers a discounted price online, this Groupon is still the best deal available.

says.emailContent: Where does your secret son sleep?
says.websiteContent:
Choosing the perfect couch is important because you're going to have to sleep on it if you ever accidentally spill something (beer) on your bed. Here are some tips for picking out a cushioned wonder: * Sit on the couch you're thinking about purchasing to make sure it's comfortable and sweat absorbent.
* You can shave a fuzzy couch to make it into a leather couch.
* Measure the couch to make sure it fits inside your house without blocking any exits or spots that the dog uses as a bathroom.
* If you've got a brother who regularly visits or a secret son who sleeps in your home every night, you're going to need a couch with a pullout bed.
* If you can't find a couch you like, ask the store if they can do a custom order or put three chairs next to each other.
says.websiteContentHtml:
Choosing the perfect couch is important because you're going to have to sleep on it if you ever accidentally spill something (beer) on your bed. Here are some tips for picking out a cushioned wonder:

  • Sit on the couch you're thinking about purchasing to make sure it's comfortable and sweat absorbent.

  • You can shave a fuzzy couch to make it into a leather couch.

  • Measure the couch to make sure it fits inside your house without blocking any exits or spots that the dog uses as a bathroom.

  • If you've got a brother who regularly visits or a secret son who sleeps in your home every night, you're going to need a couch with a pullout bed.

  • If you can't find a couch you like, ask the store if they can do a custom order or put three chairs next to each other.
says.title: The Groupon Guide to: Choosing a Couch

deals.pitchHtml:
Walk in the Park Women's Folding Rain Boots

These flexible, waterproof welly boots make it easier to prepare for inclement weather—even when you're all dolled up. The lightweight rain boots fold up snugly into their storage pouch, making them easy to stash in tote bags or the oversized pockets on your clown costume. The boots also feature a soft fleece lining that keeps feet warm, so additional welly socks may not be necessary. The basic black boots match nearly everything, and the red and floral designs help fight off bad-weather blues.

  • Folding welly rain boots with storage pouch
  • Flexible Spacetex XZ5 rubber
  • Waterproof
  • Lightweight design
  • Warm, soft fleece lining
  • Additional socks unnecessary
  • Fits true to size

deals.pitchHtml:
Going to a boot camp can make you feel like a hardened warrior or just someone who gets pleasure out of the sound of yelling. Feel stronger with this Groupon.

Choose Between Two Options

  • $39 for 5 body fat meltdown boot-camp classes (a $124.79 value)
  • $59 for 10 body fat meltdown boot-camp classes (a $249.58 value)

Patrons shed pounds the military way with intense, high-energy group workouts modeled off U.S. Marine Corps training. Nominated by the Long Island Press for Best Local Bootcamp of 2011, the workouts center around an indoor obstacle course with a tire wall and climbing ropes. In addition to building strength with pushups and sit-ups, each one-hour session increases cardiovascular endurance. See the class schedule.

The Fitness Loft

Under the direction of Cynthia Conde, gym founder and lead trainer on VH1's Bridal Bootcamp, The Fitness Loft’s expert instructors offer classes that tone muscle, build stamina, and burn fat. The sprawling Fitness Loft—which is decked out in intense military decor and rugged, army-style obstacle courses—teems with activity, from camo-clad students scaling a wall of tires during indoor boot camps to a professional circus aerialist tumbling on free-flowing silks affixed to the towering ceiling during aerial-silk classes. Beneath the mélange of dangling gymnastic rings and resistance straps, students work with the expert instructors to figure out the right routines for their goals and fitness levels. They can work specific muscle groups on the cardio and strength-training machines, swing Russian-style kettlebells, or learn the demanding art of sensual dance and fireman impersonation in Pole Conditioning classes. They can also shoo away lethargy and excess poundage in Yogalates, MMA Fit classes, and Latin-inspired Zumba dance classes.

says.websiteContent:
In this brave new millennium of ours, Facebook comments are the new social currency. Generate heaps of online validation with these top comment-generating status updates:

* "8 pounds 6 ounces! Which character from _Game of Thrones_ should we name her after?"
* "Spring has sprung! Now it's time for summer to simmer."
* "Happy B-Day to me—it's the big 3-0! That's right, it's my Bear Day—the day I gain 30 pounds so I can sign the safety waiver and begin wrestling bears professionally!"
* "It is _Back to the Future_ Day! In the movie _Back to the Future_ today is the day of the future they go back to! Hold your loved ones tight."
* "I lost my phone again. Everyone please put your telephone numbers here where goodness knows who will be able to see them."

deals.pitchHtml:
Merkury Innovations RockBox Bluetooth Wireless Speaker with Microphone

The RockBox produces fuller sound than its compact, brick-like shape would suggest. Stereo drivers give your music a balanced presentation at all volumes, and a passive subwoofer fattens the bass response. Built-in Bluetooth pairs with enabled music devices up to 30ft. away, so you can move the speaker around the house without losing connection. A mic lets you use the RockBox as a speakerphone when connected to a smartphone, tablet, or CB radio. Of course, you can also make a direct connection to devices via the 3.5mm input.

  • Portable wireless speaker
  • Full stereo sound
  • Passive subwoofer
  • Bluetooth connectivity
  • Up to 30ft. wireless range
  • Built-in microphone
  • On-unit controls
  • Clean, modern design
  • Rubberized finish won't trigger furniture's latex allergies
  • Up to seven hours of use on full charge
  • 3.5mm aux input
  • Micro-USB charging input
  • Condition: new
  • One-year warranty from Merkury
  • Dimensions: 7" (W) x 2.2" (H) x 2.2" (D)

deals.pitchHtml:
The Deal

$14.99 for three ultrasonic pest repellers with auxiliary outlets ($39.99 list price)

Ultrasonic Pest Repellers

From the moment you plug in these units, their built-in speakers release ultrasonic sound waves that are unheard by humans but sound like a never-ending accounting presentation to most pests. The waves help drive away critters such as rats, roaches, and ants. Each unit also houses an auxiliary AC outlet to make up for the one it occupies, letting you plug in another device or appliance.

Features
  • Plug-in units release ultrasonic sound waves
  • Helps repel pests such as mice, rats, spider, ants, and roaches
  • Releases no chemicals, odors, or cryptic notes threatening pests' families
  • LED indicators also serve as a night-light

Students can learn about applications during iPhoneography, practice long exposure photography during Night, Night sessions, try their hand at light painting during Shot in the Dark, or bring a tripod to take pictures with a furry friend during Masters and Pets classes. Click here to view the class schedule. Meeting places for each workshop vary, and on-location classes are weather dependent; purchasers will receive confirmation of the location via email a few days before their class.

roberta fineberg photography

Before Roberta Fineberg was an award-winning photographer, author, and teaching artist, she was a newbie, giddy with excitement when the Saturday Review published one of her photographs. Before long, her work appeared in French magazines and on book jackets for publishers such as Harcourt and Simon & Schuster. Her love of pets lead to the writing of her first book, City Riders, a story in words and pictures about three teenage girls in New York City and their shared love of horses, published by Macmillan.

When she isn't snapping dramatic portraits or offering her skills to businesses in need of creative advertising, she chronicles events and cultural milestones in her signature candid, emotional style. Roberta also shares her experience and skill with others during NYC Spark your Creativity workshops, designed to get students off the beaten path, looking at the city in a new light to boost their creativity.

deals.pitchHtml:
LG 55" Class 1080p 120Hz Cinema 3D Smart TV

Smart TVs, with their built-in WiFi and panoply of streaming services, are much better than Mean TVs, which tend to shame you for watching reality television. Essentially a 55" computer, this LG model includes a dual-core processor and DLNA compatibility, which means you can use the TV to stream films and music from your home network. Four pairs of 3D glasses let you and your friends take full advantage of the TV's ability to convert 2D entertainment into immersive 3D.

  • 55'' Smart TV
  • Model number: 55LA6205
  • Dimensions (WxHxD): 49.06"x28.39"x3.04", 49.06"x31.61"x13.46" with stand
  • Input/Output: 3 HDMI in, 3 USB 3.0/2.0 in, Component Video in, AV in, RF in, LAN, Digital Audio out, RS-232
  • 1080p (1920x1080) full-HD resolution
  • Stream content from Netflix, Hulu Plus, and YouTube
  • Access Facebook, Twitter, and other websites with built-in WiFi
  • TruMotion 120Hz
  • LED backlighting
  • Resolution upscaler
  • Triple XD engine
  • Picture Wizard II
  • 2D-to-3D conversion
  • Dual-core processor
  • DTS decoder
  • DLNA: share data over a home network
  • Skype ready
  • Windows 8 Certified
  • Intel wireless display (WiDi)
  • Includes four pairs of 3D glasses
  • Good taste in film not included
